import React from 'react'; import Grid from '@material-ui/core/Grid'; import styles from '../../css/Public.module.css'; import Link from '@material-ui/core/Link'; import { makeStyles } from '@material-ui/core/styles'; import Hidden from '@material-ui/core/Hidden'; const useStyles = makeStyles({ link: { fontFamily:'Roboto Slab', fontWeight:400, letterSpacing:'1px', color:'black', fontSize:'3rem', lineHeight:'4rem', "&:hover":{ color:'#8F8F8F' } }, link2: { fontFamily:'Roboto Slab', fontWeight:400, letterSpacing:'1px', color:'black', fontSize:'1.5rem', lineHeight:'2rem', "&:hover":{ color:'#8F8F8F' } } }); export const BottomNavbar = () => { const classes = useStyles(); return(
WORK WRITINGS ABOUT WORK WRITINGS ABOUT WORK WRITINGS ABOUT
) }
